text: allahanu avana anugrahadinda tamage dayapalisiruvudaralli (sampattinalli) jipunate toruvavaru, adu tam'ma palige uttamavendu bhavisadirali. Nijavagi adu (jipunate) avara palige kettadagide. Avaru jipunate torida a sampattannu punarut'thana dina horeyagisi avara koralige kattalaguvudu. Akasagala mattu bhumiya antima odetanavu allahanige seride mattu nivu maduttiruva ellavannu allahanu ballanu
